comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Click "Open Map" 2. Open Map comes up as a blank grid 3. Nothing else happens What is the expected output? What do you see instead? I expect the map tiles to start loading. Alternatively if the app can't access the network, I expect the app to say "I can't access the network". Or if it is accessing the network, but the network is extremely slow, I expect it to say "I'm accessing the network, but the network is extremely slow". I don't expect it to just sit there being useless. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? OpenStreetMapViewer-3.0.10-aligned.apk Android 4.0.4 Please provide any additional information below.
Please take a look at our sample app which demonstrates how to use osmdroid. If you need help I suggest asking a question on the mailing list.
